00009 typedef unsigned short clock_time_t;
00010 #define CLOCK_CONF_SECOND 125
00011 /* Maximum tick interval is 0xffff/125 = 524 seconds */
00012 #define RIME_CONF_BROADCAST_ANNOUNCEMENT_MAX_TIME CLOCK_CONF_SECOND * 524UL /* Default uses 600UL */
00013 #define COLLECT_CONF_BROADCAST_ANNOUNCEMENT_MAX_TIME CLOCK_CONF_SECOND * 524UL /* Default uses 600UL */

00022 #define UIP_CONF_TCP              1

00025 /* See uip-ds6.h */
00026 #define UIP_CONF_DS6_NBR_NBU      20
00027 #define UIP_CONF_DS6_DEFRT_NBU    2
00028 #define UIP_CONF_DS6_PREFIX_NBU   3

00031 #define UIP_CONF_DS6_MADDR_NBU    0

00034 #define NETSTACK_CONF_NETWORK     sicslowpan_driver
00035 #define NETSTACK_CONF_MAC         nullmac_driver
00036 #define SICSLOWPAN_CONF_COMPRESSION SICSLOWPAN_COMPRESSION_HC06
00037 #define NETSTACK_CONF_RDC         sicslowmac_driver
00038 #define NETSTACK_CONF_FRAMER      framer_802154
00039 #define NETSTACK_CONF_RADIO       rf230_driver
00040 #define CHANNEL_802_15_4          26
00041 /* AUTOACK receive mode gives better rssi measurements, even if ACK is never requested */
00042 #define RF230_CONF_AUTOACK        1
00043 /* Request 802.15.4 ACK on all packets sent (else autoretry). This is primarily for testing. */
00044 #define SICSLOWPAN_CONF_ACK_ALL   0
00045 /* Number of auto retry attempts 0-15 (0 implies don't use extended TX_ARET_ON mode with CCA) */
00046 #define RF230_CONF_AUTORETRIES    2
00047 #define SICSLOWPAN_CONF_FRAG      1
00048 /* Most browsers reissue GETs after 3 seconds which stops fragment reassembly so a longer MAXAGE does no good */
00049 #define SICSLOWPAN_CONF_MAXAGE    3
00050 /* How long to wait before terminating an idle TCP connection. Smaller to allow faster sleep. Default is 120 seconds */
00051 #define UIP_CONF_WAIT_TIMEOUT     5
00052 
00053 #else
00054 /* ip4 should build but is largely untested */
00055 #define RIMEADDR_CONF_SIZE        2
00056 #define NETSTACK_CONF_NETWORK     rime_driver
00057 #endif /* UIP_CONF_IPV6 */
